summary: This document is an email chain from April 2021 regarding the creation of review batches for an 'Epstein SW database'. The emails discuss running searches for specific email addresses (gmax@cam, gmaxl.com, aace@com) and terms (gmax, gmaxl) to create batches of approximately 500 documents each from materials designated responsive in a search warrant database.

events.title: Initial Request for Epstein Database Batches
events.description: An initial email request to create review batches from the Epstein search warrant database by searching for terms 'gmax' and 'gmaxl'.

events.title: Follow-up and Completion of Database Batches
events.description: Email correspondence following up on and confirming the completion of creating review batches (BATCH001) from the Epstein search warrant database based on specific email address searches.

keyFacts: The document references an 'Epstein SW database', indicating a search warrant database related to the Epstein investigation.
Specific search terms and email addresses (gmax@cam, gmaxl.com, aace@com) were used to create review batches from the responsive materials.
The batches were created in sizes of approximately 500 documents each, labeled as BATCH001.
The email chain shows ongoing investigative work related to the Epstein case as of early 2021.
